testcase.classname: To validate Adactin HotelApp login functionality
testcase.name: To check the credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is in Adactin login page.........................................passed When user enter invalid username and invalid password.......................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then user gets the Error message............................................passed

testcase.classname: To validate Adactin HotelApp login functionality
testcase.name: To check user enter valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is in Adactin login page.........................................passed When user enter valid username and valid password...........................passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then user gets passed to next page..........................................passed
